channel.title: Music – Third Party
channel.description: Recent content in Third Party on Music

item.title: 넬(NELL),Third Party - Northern Lights (Radio Edit)
item.description:
혼자 남겨진 길 위에
어둠이 내릴 때쯤
니가 나의 위로
밝게 빛나네
어디쯤 와 있는 걸까
어지러워질 때쯤
모두 너로
다시 선명해지네
And when my fires
burning out
You shine like
the northern lights
You shine like
the northern lights
And when my heart is
filled with doubt
You shine like
the northern lights
You shine like
the northern lights
You shine like
the northern lights

And when my fires
burning out
You shine like
the northern lights
You shine like
the northern lights
혼자 남겨진 방 안에
외로움이 내릴 때쯤
니가 나의 위로
밝게 빛나네
답이 없는 질문 속에
어지러워질 때쯤
모두 너로
다시 선명해지네
And when my fires
burning out
You shine like
the northern lights
You shine like
the northern lights
And when my heart is
filled with doubt
You shine like
the northern lights
You shine like
the northern lights
You shine like
the northern lights

And when my fires
burning out
You shine like
the northern lights
You shine like
the northern lights
You shine like
the northern lights
